fields.name: NormalStandardWorkScheduleText
fields.fieldText:
Normal Standard Work Schedule
What is the Normal or Standard Work Schedule for employees during the week? Provide your best estimate for the start and end times and number of hours worked for each work day. (If employees did not work standard schedules, skip to the next question.)
Please enter time in a ##:## AM/PM format, such as 9:30 AM or 05:15 PM

fields.name: ThankYouOnlySeniorDeputy
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submission of this Report of Labor Law Violation.
However, only a user that is a Deputy or Senior Deputy may immediate set this Report of Labor Law Violation as an investigation. Please talk to your manager to ensure that your Employee record is setup in Salesforce correctly.
Debug Error: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ReportingPartyHelp
fields.fieldText: Reporting Party

fields.name: ReportingPartyHelpText
fields.fieldText: Fill out this form if you would like to report a widespread violation of workplace laws (e.g., wage and hour, child labor, workers’ compensation, or recordkeeping laws) by an employer that affects all or a group of employees working for the employer. If you are claiming only unpaid wages on behalf of yourself and do not wish to report a widespread violation of the law by your employer that also affects other workers, then fill out the DLSE Form 1 (Initial Report or Claim) to file an individual wage claim, instead of this form.
